name: Old Skull
description:
Pitch

Simple game about a skull that can stop discs in place but can't escape a circle.

Controls

Keyboard mode - WASD to move and SPACEBAR to use the ability

Mouse mode - CLICK to move and RIGHT CLICK to use the ability

The menu doesn't work with keyboard because that's boring to code, sorry.

Credits

@Latrabili_Noctu - Game music

@TheZampapan - Programming support and win screen music

@FranVadilloSb - The other things
